是.en: (respectful acknowledgement of a command) very well

好.en: (before an adjective for exclamatory effect) so
(of two people) close; on intimate terms
to be fond of; to have a tendency to; to be prone to

也.en: (literary) particle having functions similar to 啊[a5]

去.en: to be apart from in space or time
(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth
(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)
(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)

会.en: can; to have the skill; to know how to
to be likely to; to be sure to

有.en: (bound form) having; with; -ful; -ed; -al (as in 有意[you3yi4] intentional)

别.en: to fasten with a pin or clip
to stick in; to insert (in order to hinder movement)
(noun suffix) category (e.g. 性別|性别[xing4 bie2], 派別|派别[pai4 bie2])
to make sb change their ways, opinions etc

告诉.en: to press charges; to file a complaint
to tell; to inform; to let know

他.en: he; him (used for either sex when the sex is unknown or unimportant)

在.en: (of sb or sth) to be (located) at
(used before a verb to indicate an action in progress)

这.en: (bound form) this; the (followed by a noun)
(bound form) this; these (followed by a classifier) (in this sense, commonly pr. [zhei4], esp. in Beijing)

知道.en: to know; to become aware of

的.en: (used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
also pr. [di4] or [di5] in poetry and songs
a taxi; a cab (abbr. for 的士[di1shi4])

你.en: you (informal, as opposed to courteous 您[nin2])
you (Note: In Taiwan, 妳 is used to address females, but in mainland China, it is not commonly used. Instead, 你 is used to address both males and females.)

做.en: to do; to engage in; to hold (a party etc)
(of a person) to be (an intermediary, a good student etc); to become (husband and wife, friends etc)
(of a thing) to serve as; to be used for

到底.en: when all is said and done

了.en: (modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)

想.en: to miss (feel wistful about the absence of)

要.en: to want; to need; to ask for

得.en: structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc

还有.en: there still remain(s); there is (or are) still

需要.en: to need; to want; to demand; to require

很.en: (also, often used before an adjective without intensifying its meaning, i.e. as a meaningless syntactic element)

意思.en: to give as a small token
to do sth as a gesture of goodwill etc

对.en: to add; to pour in (a fluid)

就是.en: (used correlatively with 也[ye3]) even; even if

一直.en: continuously; always; all the way through

那.en: (pronoun) that (referring to persons, things or situations)

就.en: (after a suppositional clause) in that case; then
(after a clause of action) as soon as; immediately after
(same as 就是[jiu4 shi4]) merely; nothing else but; simply; just; precisely; exactly
as much as; as many as
(often followed by 著|着[zhe5]) taking advantage of
(pattern: 就[jiu4] ... 也[ye3] ...) even if ... still ...
(pattern: 不[bu4] ... 就[jiu4] ...) if not ... then must be ...

来.en: (used as a substitute for a more specific verb)
hither (directional complement for motion toward the speaker, as in 回來|回来[hui2lai5])
ever since (as in 自古以來|自古以来[zi4gu3 yi3lai2])
(prefix) the coming ...; the next ... (as in 來世|来世[lai2shi4])
(used after 得[de2] to indicate possibility, as in 談得來|谈得来[tan2de5lai2], or after 不[bu4] to indicate impossibility, as in 吃不來|吃不来[chi1bu5lai2])

吧.en: bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)
abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]

个.en: (classifier used before a noun that has no specific classifier)
used in 自個兒|自个儿[zi4 ge3 r5]

到.en: to leave for; to go to
to (a place); until (a time); up to (a point)
(verb complement indicating arriving at a place or reaching a point)

只.en: grain that has begun to ripen
classifier for birds and certain animals, one of a pair, some utensils, vessels etc

和.en: (joining two nouns) and; together with; with (Taiwan pr. [han4])
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water
classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs

说.en: to speak; to talk; to say

哦.en: oh (interjection indicating that one has just learned sth)
sentence-final particle that conveys informality, warmth, friendliness or intimacy
may also indicate that one is stating a fact that the other person is not aware of

啊.en: interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer
modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent

不会.en: not having learned to do sth

杀.en: to kill; to slay; to murder; to attack

一起.en: an instance of; a case of (murder, accident, dispute etc)

相信.en: to believe; to be convinced; to accept as true

没.en: (negative prefix for verbs) have not; not

看.en: (after a verb) to give it a try

当.en: at or in the very same...

喜欢.en: to like; to be fond of

那个.en: (used before a verb or adjective for emphasis)
(used to humorously or indirectly refer to sth embarrassing, funny etc, or when one can't think of the right word)
(used in speech as a filler, similar to "umm", "you know" etc)

拜托.en: to request sb to do sth

走.en: away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])

把.en: to hold a baby in position to help it urinate or defecate
(used to put the object before the verb: 把[ba3] + {noun} + {verb})

啦.en: sentence-final particle, contraction of 了啊, indicating exclamation
particle placed after each item in a list of examples

发生.en: to happen; to occur; to take place; to break out

叫.en: by (indicates agent in the passive mood)

正在.en: right in the middle of (doing sth)

用.en: to use; to make use of; to employ
to need; to have to (usu. used in the negative or in questions)

所.en: classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc
particle introducing a relative clause or passive

钱.en: unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]

从.en: (bound form) (Taiwan pr. [zong4]) related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor

您.en: you (courteous, as opposed to informal 你[ni3])

着.en: aspect particle indicating action in progress or ongoing state

呢.en: dense wool fabric (used for coats and jackets)
particle indicating that a previously asked question is to be applied to the preceding word ("What about ...?", "And ...?")
particle for inquiring about location ("Where is ...?")
particle signaling a pause, to emphasize the preceding words and allow the listener time to take them on board ("ok?", "are you with me?")
(at the end of a declarative sentence) particle indicating continuation of a state or action

觉得.en: to think that ...; to feel that ...

让.en: by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])

连.en: (used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even

该.en: to be sb's turn to do sth

一.en: also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

起来.en: to stand up; to get up
(after a verb) indicating the beginning and continuation of an action or a state
indicating an upward movement (e.g. after 站[zhan4])
(after a perception verb, e.g. 看[kan4]) expressing preliminary judgment

有没有.en: (before a noun) Do (you, they etc) have ...?
(before a verb) Did (you, they etc) (verb, infinitive)?

一点.en: (used in negative expressions) (not) the least bit
(after an adjective, used to form the comparative) a bit more, -er
one o'clock (abbr. for 一點鍾|一点钟[yi1 dian3zhong1])

过去.en: to go over; to pass by

嗯.en: interjection indicating approval, appreciation or agreement

等.en: and so on; etc.; et al.
(literary) (plural suffix attached to a personal pronoun or noun)

爱.en: to love; to be fond of; to like
to be inclined (to do sth); to tend to (happen)

再.en: further; beyond this point of time
then (after sth, and not until then)
no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
(used to introduce additional information, as in 再則|再则[zai4ze2], 再就是[zai4jiu4shi4] etc)

认为.en: to believe; to think; to consider; to feel

谈谈.en: to discuss; to have a chat

下.en: to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)
measure word to show the frequency of an action

刚才.en: just now (variant of 剛才|刚才[gang1 cai2])

所有.en: to have; to possess; to own

喂.en: to feed (an animal, baby, invalid etc)

肯定.en: to be certain; to be positive

点.en: to pour a liquid drop by drop
(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]

闭嘴.en: same as 閉上嘴巴|闭上嘴巴

干.en: taken in to nominal kinship; adoptive; foster
(bound form) to have to do with; to concern oneself with
one of the ten heavenly stems 天干[tian gan1]

一下.en: (used after a verb) give it a go
to do (sth for a bit to give it a try)

啥.en: dialectal equivalent of 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]

看起来.en: seemingly; apparently; looks as if; appears to be; gives the impression that; seems on the face of it to be

住.en: (suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)

答应.en: to answer positively; to agree; to accept; to promise
